items.title: Information Collection
items: We collect personal information you provide, such as your name, email address, and other contact details.
We collect information about your usage of the website, including IP addresses, device information, and usage patterns.

items.title: Information Use
items: We use your information to provide job matching services, improve our website, and communicate with you.
We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties.
You have the option to provide consent to share your information with potential employers when using our services. This consent can be updated or withdrawn at any time.

items.title: Email Notifications
items: You have the option to agree to receive email notifications about job opportunities and updates from us. You can manage your notification preferences in your account settings.

items.title: Data Security
items: We implement security measures to protect your data but cannot guarantee absolute security.
You are responsible for keeping your login credentials secure.

items.title: Cookies
items: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your interactions with our website.

items.title: Third-Party Links
items: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices.

items.title: Updates to the Privacy Policy
items: We may update this Privacy Policy. You are encouraged to review it periodically.
